June 1, 1955
Lt. Richard L. Spears
Office Information Services
Air Weather Service
Military Air Transport Service
United States Air Force
Washington 25, D.C.
Dear Lt. Spearsi
With further reference to your letter of
April lli in which you inquire as to NAEB*s interest
in a possible series of thirteen programs on
meteorology and climatology, I am writing to say
that I think such a series would be received by our
network members with enthusiasm. I have discussed
this with our network program planning committee
which has advised me to urge the Air Weather Service
to prepare such a series.
If you can proceed as indicated, I would
appreciate being kept advised of the progress.
Sincerely yours.
FESsjs
Frank E. Schooley
President
